page.title: 03A day in the life of Verity
page.content: My name is{Verity Richards}and I am 11 years old.Here is how I spend my day.I set my alarm clock for{7.30am} I get up.Go downstairs and have my breakfast,I usually have Rice Krispies.After I have finished I go upstairs and get dressed.By this time it is about{8.15am.}I go to the bathroom,brush my teeth and wash my face. {8.45am}I try to get to school by this time. {9.00am}school starts at this time. {3.45pm}school finishes by this time. {4.00pm}I usually get home and play on my sisters computer. {6.30pm}I have my tea I usually have something on toast or sandwiches and crisps.After tea I play with friends. {8.00pm}I get changed for bed.{ {9.00pm I go to bed.
